t:
“I'm sorry sir, but your wife has met with an accident, and she's dead,” the policeman said.


“Who's it, honey?” my wife called out from her room.

“I think there's been some kind of misunderstanding,” I said to the police, confused, “she hadn't even left for her trip yet.”



One of them looked at his watch and said, “Shit, we're early.”
c:
“But we've already killed her!” another replied.



Collab to complete the #conversation. Feel free to complete a longer story in the caption. #hatetosaythis #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#accident #timetravel #police #murder #twist





That was so complexly twisted. Take your time and figure out the twists.
